index.singinEasy:
Sign up before processing your logs, it's quick and easy.
Then you'll be able to track your jobs and communicate more easily with the ezPAARSE team.
index.description: An free software that allows analysis,the enrichment and exploitation of access logs to electronic resources offered by web platforms of scientific literature publishers. It is a Web application with a form and a API allowing the manual and automatic ingestion of logs generated by the servers and proxies of the institutions.
index.fewClicksToInstall: A few clicks are enough to install it and analyze your logs.
index.contactUs: A problem, a question, a suggestion? Contact us!
index.demoHeader: This instance of ezPAARSE is available for demonstration purposes.
index.demoText: We strongly advise against its use in production or for large logs.

profile.title: My profile
profile.notifications: Receive a notification email at the end of my processing operations.
profile.emailSent: An email has been sent to you to reset your password

process.title: Process your logs
process.curl: Copy the following command to run the query with cURL using the current setting of the form. You may need to change the instance URL, the file path or add options like --proxy or --no-buffer
process.explainationLogs: Indicate here the logs that you want ezPAARSE to analyze. Your logs may require special settings for ezPAARSE to understand them. If necessary, contact the ezPAARSE team for a configuration help.
process.explainationTestsLogs: You want to use test logs to validate your installation, we provide them on GitHub.

settings.title: Settings
settings.counterReportDetail: * The reports are not COUNTER certified, however the deduplication algorithm and output formats follow the recommendations.
settings.saveAsNew: Save as new custom predefined settings

logFormat.firstLogLine: Based on the first log line
logFormat.detectionFailed: The automatic detection failed to determine the format of your log lines

descriptions.nb-lines-ignored: Number of irrelevant requests. These are mainly downloads of images, css or web scripts that are not directly related to a resource. In a raw log, this number is often high.
descriptions.nb-denied-ecs:
List of accesses that have been denied to the user at the time of the click.
Example: attempt to access an item not negotiated in the establishment's bouquet
descriptions.nb-lines-duplicate-ecs: Number of consultations ignored because detected as double-clicks.
descriptions.nb-lines-unknown-domains: Domains not currently managed by ezPAARSE. You can download the complete list of unknown domains encountered by clicking below
descriptions.nb-lines-unqualified-ecs: The parsers did not recognize documentary information in the URLs of these log lines. They are therefore ignored by ezPAARSE.
descriptions.nb-lines-unordered-ecs: Lines ignored due to wrong chronological order.

job.title: Ongoing processing(s)
job.infos: ezPAARSE has finished processing your logs. Macros Excel and LibreOffice are at your disposal if you wish to have a first visual overview of the results.

platforms.title: Platforms
platforms.noPlatformFoundWithName: No platform found with this name : {search}

updates.title: Updates
updates.predefinedParameters: Predefined parameters and other resources independent of the ezPAARSE version.
updates.middlewaresInfo: Elements of the ezPAARSE processing chain.
updates.updateDuration: Updating ezPAARSE can take several minutes. The server will be offline for the duration of the operation.
updates.repoLocalChanges: It seems that local changes have been applied to the {repo} directory. In that case, future updates might fail.
updates.softLocalChanges: It seems that local changes have been applied to the source code of this instance. Future updates might fail.
updates.contactDeploymentService: In case of problems, we invite you to contact the person in charge of the installation.
updates.upwardStable: The current version of the software has got changes that are more recent than the latest stable release. Click the button above if you wish to get back to the latest stable release.

feedback.email: Your feedback will be sent to ezpaarse@couperin.org. A copy will be sent to you at the address indicated below.

ui.name: Name
ui.informTeamWarning: You just installed ezPAARSE and you're going to create the administrator account. With your agreement, we would like to be informed about this installation. The e-mail address filled above and the version of ezPAARSE you installed will be sent to {recipients}.
ui.ezPAARSEOffline: ezPAARSE is not responding. This message will automatically disappear when the connection is reestablished.
